dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1982 IH: Return to Sender Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cloud (for himself and Ms. Greene of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To repeal and rescind any unobligated balances under sections 70002 and 70003 of the Inflation Reduction Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Return to Sender Act.

The unobligated balances of amounts appropriated or otherwise made available by sections 70002 and 70003 of Public Law 117â€“169 (commonly referred to as the Inflation Reduction Act), as of the date of enactment of this Act are rescinded and those sections are hereby repealed.
